entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, McCreary

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
